title: Bhishma's Vow
small_description: A tale of unmatched devotion and sacrifice, where Bhishma pledges lifelong celibacy to protect his father's promise.

title: Abhimanyu's Chakravyuh
small_description: The brave prince enters a deadly war formation he knows how to enter but not exit, displaying courage against all odds.

title: Ekalavya’s Thumb
small_description: A story of devotion and sacrifice, where Ekalavya, a tribal prince, sacrifices his thumb to honor his guru Dronacharya.

title: Ganga’s Silent Sacrifice
small_description: A tale of devotion and sacrifice, where Ganga, the river goddess, offers herself to the sage Kapila to save humanity from a curse.
